channel.title: Apostle's "Cult numbers" doesn't work when someone is on trial
channel.description:
#### What happened? Apostle cannot use Cult Numbers when someone is already on trial, has to use it beforehand since the ability button becomes greyed out when someone is on trial.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Noble can use his noble twin ability which is basically the same thing when someone is on trial, I think apostle should be able to use it too.
#### Steps to reproduce: Try to use Cult Numbers when someone is on trial.
#### Comments: I'm not sure if this is a bug or intended, but the fact that it works differently than noble while being pretty much the same ability seems like a bug to me.

item.description:
Yeah, the voting abilities are nigh-on useless for people that have them since they can’t be activated once voting starts. And voting can start before you could even click on the ability as an added bonus.
